item.title: Host Multple Blog on one Github Pages
item.description:
不同Blog想要放在同個Github Page...?

  1. 建立Repo. Ex. https://github.com/jimmyliao/Life.git

  2. 裡面新增一個source branch

  3. 最簡單的方法，新增index.html (optional) 或是把原本site generator(例如hexo)搬同樣一份, 請見步驟4

4.1 clone一份Project repo, 方便起見還是在remote設定gh-pages & source, gh-pages就是最後發布的branch. 請見 Ref #1 4.2

 1$ mkdir hexo
 2$ cd hexo
 3$ hexo init
 4INFO Cloning hexo-starter to ~/WebDrive/GitHub/Blogging/Life.git/blog_src
 5Cloning into '/Users/jimmyliao/WebDrive/GitHub/Blogging/Life.git/blog_src'...
 6remote: Counting objects: 53, done.
 7remote: Total 53 (delta 0), reused 0 (delta 0), pack-reused 53
 8Unpacking objects: 100% (53/53), done.
 9Checking connectivity... done.
10Submodule 'themes/landscape' (https://github.com/hexojs/hexo-theme-landscape.git) registered for path 'themes/landscape'
11Cloning into 'themes/landscape'...
12remote: Counting objects: 730, done.
13remote: Total 730 (delta 0), reused 0 (delta 0), pack-reused 730
14Receiving objects: 100% (730/730), 2.51 MiB | 955.00 KiB/s, done.
15Resolving deltas: 100% (384/384), done.
16Checking connectivity... done.
17Submodule path 'themes/landscape': checked out 'decdc2d9956776cbe95420ae94bac87e22468d38'
18INFO Install dependencies
19...
20
21 `-- serve-static@1.10.2
22 +-- escape-html@1.0.3
23 `-- send@0.13.1
24 +-- destroy@1.0.4
25 +-- etag@1.7.0
26 +-- fresh@0.3.0
27 +-- http-errors@1.3.1
28 +-- range-parser@1.0.3
29 `-- statuses@1.2.1
30INFO Start blogging with Hexo!
31

產生template之後

1$ hexo g
2...
3INFO 28 files generated in 648 ms

記得修改一下_config.yml

1url: http://jimmyliao.github.io/Life
2root: /Life/
3
4...
5deploy:
6 type: git
7 repo: https://github.com/jimmyliao/Life.git
8branch: gh-pages
9

 1$ npm install hexo-deployer-git --save #裝一下deployer
 2$ npm install hexo-renderer-stylus --save #裝一下不然會整個css破掉, hexo issue
 3$ hexo d
 4...
 5To https://github.com/jimmyliao/Life.git
 6 + 541ea14...4eb6485 HEAD -> gh-pages (forced update)
 7Branch master set up to track remote branch gh-pages from https://github.com/jimmyliao/Life.git.
 8INFO Deploy done: git
 9
10
  1. 測試.

http://jimmyliao.github.io -> 主站 http://jimmyliao.github.io/Life -> 利用Project Pages新增的

P.S. 不過我開這麼多個，也沒在寫Blog啊

Ref. #1. https://help.github.com/articles/user-organization-and-project-pages/

item.title: Move to Hexo
item.description:
A new start for blogging...

  1. Follow this
1$ sudo npm install --unsafe-perm --verbose -g hexo
2$ mkdir hexo
3$ cd hexo
4$ hexo init
5$ npm install hexo --no-optional
6$ npm install
7
8$ hexo g #完整是hexo generate 生成靜態頁面
9$ hexo s #完整是hexo server 運行本地服務器

裝git發布插件，運行：

1$ npm install hexo-deployer-git --save

安裝完成後在Hexo根目錄通過_config.yml對相關參數進行設置，在最後幾行：

1deploy:
2 type: git
3 repo: git@github.com/abc/abc.github.io.git #這裏是你剛獲取的地址
4branch: master

1$ vim ~/.ssh/config

1host abc.github.com
2 HostName github.com
3 IdentityFile ~/.ssh/github_rsa
4 User git

保存設置，撰寫新文章，然後生成頁面，最後發布頁面：

1$ hexo new [layout] <title>
2$ hexo g
3$ hexo d #完整是hexo deploy 發布到遠程服務器

或是生成頁面和發布頁面用一條命令：

1$ hexo d -g

P.S. have to hexo clean before hexo g

1$ hexo clean
2$ hexo g
3$ hexo d
  1. Follow this instruction to setup local env.

Update: Following steps are for anther laptop

1$ git clone your hexo repo (source branch)
2$ npm install hexo --save #reinstall if new env does not have hexo cli
3$ npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
4$ hexo init
5$ git clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next themes/next
6$ hexo g
7$ hexo d
8

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Another Hello World for Hexo

Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

1$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

1$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

1$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

1$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment

item.title: Re-Setup Octopress on different laptop
item.description:
You will learn how to create blog post on different laptop.

Note: I break my old octopress system, give up to restore and move to hexo since I wrote Node.JS for some projects.

item.title: How to add [Read on] more link
item.description:
Simply add 'more' in the '' into the post where you want to add the more link. Be sure there has some text before more link except Reference link.

Reference: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/13538047/octopress-index-page/13552502#13552502

item.title: octopress from zero
item.description:
How to use rake & git with your octopress.

Reference: http://octopress.org/docs/blogging/ http://zerodie.github.io/blog/2012/01/19/octopress-github-pages/

  1. How to new post rake new_post Enter a title for your post: "Octopress from zero...again!" Creating new post: source/_posts/2014-03-15-octopress-from-zero-dot-dot-dot-again.markdown

  2. Edit the markdown file

  3. Generate & Preview -> rake generate -> rake watch -> rake preview (preview on localhost:4000)

  4. Push & Deploy -> git add . -> git commit -m "..." -> git push origin master -> rake deploy

item.title: my first octopress
item.description:
this page uses the Markdown syntax. (or refer: https://help.github.com/articles/github-flavored-markdo wn)

#1. /README.md

1This file is to describe the myconfig file structure and how to use

Tweaks:

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/17609453/rake-gen-deploy-rejected-in-octopress Edit the Rakefile and look for this line:

1system "git push origin #{deploy_branch}"

Alter the line by adding a plus (+) before the #{deploy_branch} tag:

1system "git push origin +#{deploy_branch}"

Run the command

1rake deploy

References:

http://zespia.tw/blog/2012/01/14/hello-octopress/ http://zerodie.github.io/blog/2012/01/19/octopress-github-pages/

git pull origin master

[Fast deploy post] rake generate rake preview

[Remember to push&deploy] git add . git commit -m "msg" git push origin master

rake deploy

item.title: 1st post: setup on Octopress on Github page
